price: 95. Annaguna inaan ku tusno waxaan ugu gooddinno waan Awoodnaa.
arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā ʿalā an nuriyaka mā naʿiduhum laqādirūna
